Reviews.Title: 10" Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tab
Reviews.Content: Brand new and clean item. Would have been easier to work with if I had a larger instruction booklet to read.

Reviews.Title: Not very impressive
Reviews.Author: Mario Soto Sr.
Reviews.Content: Very hard to configure and not designed with the user in mind. Hard to install anything productive and not enough memory. You get what you pay for it!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Internet ready with internal WiFi B/G/N
Google Play Store Installed - Games, Sports, Business, Entertainment
Skype Facebook Youtube App ready
HDMI Output
User' manual, stylus pen, OTG cable and AC power supply included
ProductInfo.Name: 10" Android Tablet - 1GB Ram 1.5Ghz CPU WiFi Google Play Store Installed
